title: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm (Aokana: Four Rhythm Across the Blue)
synopsis: With the invention of anti-gravitational shoes known as Grav-Shoes, the ability to fly freely has become an everyday experience for the people inhabiting a four-island archipelago south of Japan. This invention has brought the people new ways of living and also a new sport known as "Flying Circus," where participants gain points by either touching floating buoys or their opponent's back.
characters: ['Tobisawa, Misaki', 'Kurashina, Asuka', 'Arisaka, Mashiro', 'Ichinose, Rika', 'Hinata, Masaya', 'Inui, Saki', 'Kagami, Aoi', 'Satouin, Reiko', 'Avalon, Irina', 'Aoyagi, Madoka']
